page.title: 18BIRDS IN ELMSTEAD AREA.
page.content: During June 1985 we visited three locations in our area,one was near a wood the second on farmland near Bromley Brook and the last location was an area round Elmstead Church.We saw a lot of summer visitors ,mostly {swifts,swallows}and a few{house {martins}catching insects in the air. Flocks of{rooks}were seen flying over the fields and feeding.Large numbers of{sparrows}were nesting in the church tower.We saw many{wood pigeons}at each location.{Skylarks}were singing high in the air and flying to nests in the fields.One{lark}was having a dustbath. {Goldfinches}were feeding on the weeds and a{nightingale}was heard in the wood.A dead{magpie}was hung up in the wood.We think the farmer put it there to scare off other magpies.We also saw {lapwings,starlings,blackbirds,a jay , {chaffinch,mallard,thrush}and{kestrel.}
